actions.name: Use
actions.spellEffect: illusory, unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level

system.shortDescription: This spell functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g{minor creation}, except the object created is a semi-real illusion. Any creature that interacts with the object may make a Will save, with success causing the object to cease to exist. A gnome casting this spell may make a Spellcraft check in place of any Craft check required to make a complex item.
